colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN 'GRO'I LHA SKAL NYAG GCIG RJE BTZUN DAM PA RIN PO CHE'I SKU PHRENG BRGYAD PA ^ RJE BTZUN DAM PA @003B NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS KYI NYI MA BSTAN 'DZIN DBANG PHYUG DPAL BZANG PO'I ZHAL SNGA NAS KYI GZUGS SKU CHOS KYI DBYINGS SU THIM PA'I YANG SRID MYUR BYON GSOL 'DEBS RE 'BRAS LHUN GRUB MA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI AE RTE NI PHYAG MDZOD PA BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN, ,T'A BLA MA BCAS KYIS BKA' 'BANGS SPYI'I DON DU 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BDAG CHEN MO NAS DNGUL SLANG LNGA LHA RDZAS BCAS BSKUL NGOR, ^T'A KHU RAL MKHAN PO SPRUL MING KOO SHI KA RATNA AARTHA SIDDHI BADZRA GYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,GRUB PA'I 'KHOR BSGYUR BYANG PHYOGS 'GRO BA'I @004A *, ,MGON, ,MTSUNGS MED 'DREN MCHOG RJE BTZUN DAM PA YI, ,YANG SRID MCHOG SPRUL MYUR DU GSAL 'GYUR TE, ,BSTAN SRID SA CHEN YONGS LA DBANG BYED SHOG ,BYANG PHYOGS 'GRO BA'I MGON PO CHOS KYI RJE, ,NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS KYI NYI MA MCHOG ,SLAR YANG NGUR SMRIG GAR GYIS RNAM ROL TE, ,BSKAL RGYA'I BAR DU BRTAN BAR ZHUGS SU GSOL,, ,,)
